name: microfrontend-registry-workspace
description: Angular Shell Application with Microapps and JSON Registry

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shell && npm run install:microapps
scripts.install:microapps: cd microapp1 && npm install && cd ../microapp2 && npm install && cd ../microapp3 && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shell && npm run build:microapps
scripts.build:microapps: npm run build:microapp1 && npm run build:microapp2 && npm run build:microapp3
scripts.serve:dev: concurrently "npm run serve:shell" "npm run serve:microapp1" "npm run serve:microapp2" "npm run serve:microapp3"
